properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:14AM CST until January 13 at 12:36PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...

Saline River At Benton affecting Saline County


River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall
forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of
flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall
forecasts.

Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our
Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at...
www.weather.gov/lzk
Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.

The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Saline River At Benton.
* from Saturday evening to Monday afternoon...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 10:30 AM Friday the stage was 3.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage on
Saturday. Based on the current forecast, the river is expected to
reach 19.0 feet around early Sunday morning. This is expected to be
a relatively short duration flooding event, with the river possibly
falling back below flood stage by Sunday evening.
* Impacts at 20.0 feet...Pastures along west bank will flood. There
may be some low lying county roads near the river flooding.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...Remember to Turn Around...Don't Drown
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.

Everyone with property or other interest along streams and rivers
should remain alert to changing weather forecasts. Should conditions
change...Look for river forecasts or Flood Warnings for use in making
informed decisions to protect life and property.
